name: Intervale Capital
overview: Intervale Capital is a private equity firm investing in the upstream energy sector, with a particular focus on middle-market manufacturing and service businesses. The firm, together with its predecessor firms run by the managing partners, currently holds investments in eight companies with headquarters located in Fort Worth, Houston, Tulsa, Los Angeles, Reading, England and Weatherford, Oklahoma. These businesses have operations in oil and natural gas producing regions around the world. Professionals in their firm have led over 100 transactions in the oilfield services space over the last twenty years.

funding_round.source_description: Soane Energy Raises $10M For Clean Oil Technology
